00014   void  Window::getDiv(char* str,int *colNum,int *rowNum,
00015                              int *newWidth,int *newHigh)
00016 //
00017 //  Returns in which way we should devide window if we want
00018 //  obtain  new windows. The information about the way it
00019 //  should be partitioned is in string "str" and has a form:
00020 //             n=HORxVER
00021 {
00022   int num,x,y;
00023   char c;
00024 
00025   istrstream  is(str);
00026 
00027   is >> num >> c >> x >> c >> y ;
00028 
00029   if(!is || x <= 0 || y <= 0)
00030     usrErr("Window::getDiv",EINPDAT);
00031 
00032 
00033   *newWidth=width/x;
00034 
00035   *newHigh=high/y;
00036 
00037 
00038   *colNum=x;
00039   *rowNum=y;
00040 
00041 }// Window::getDiv  //
